segments.text: This drawing shows a typical kitchen setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets are open on the left wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A cookie jar sits inside one, full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's using a stool to access it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate while reaching in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems unsteady, legs spread wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby is poised to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the right, the sink area has the woman drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on, causing an overflow into a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water, but she's unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window overlooking the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The path and bushes outside look well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the wet floor poses a slipping risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a scene of routine with hidden dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens to them.
segments.speaker: PAR
